title: Bright and joyful is the morn

verses.text:
Bright and joyful is the morn,
For to us a child is born;
From the highest realms of heaven,
Unto us a Son is given.

On his shoulder he shall bear
Power and majesty, and wear
On his vesture and his thigh
Names most awful, names most high.

Wonderful in counsel he,
The incarnate Deity,
Sire of ages ne'er to fail,
Prince of peace whose love shall never fail.

Come and worship at his feet,
Yield to Christ the homage meet,
From his manger to his throne,
Worship Christ and Christ alone.
